page.title: 07BATTLEDYKES FARM
page.content:
{BATTLEDYKES,}A MIXED-ARABLE FARM, LIES{3.5}KM NORTH OF FORFAR IN THE COUNTY OF ANGUS.
THE FARM IS{180}ACRES APPROXIMATELY WITH{70}ACRES OF BARLEY USED FOR MALTING AND{24}ACRES OF WHEAT FOR MILLING.THE{20}ACRES OF POTATOES ARE FOR SEED WITH THE{15}ACRES OF PEAS FOR HUMAN CONSUMPTION.THE{14}ACRES OF HAY IS USED ON BATTLEDYKES OR IT IS SOLD TO OTHER FARMERS WHO NEED SOME MORE HAY.THERE ARE{20}ACRES OF TIMBER; MOSTLY SOFTWOOD.
THE FARMER DOES NOT GROW ANYTHING UNLESS HE KNOWS SOME ONE IS GOING TO BUY HIS PRODUCE.THERE IS VERY LITTLE LIVESTOCK, MAINLY CATTLE.
